feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-10-31T00:18:40.909571Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Gmail、雅虎宣布针对批量发件人的新的 2024 年身份验证要求</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.google/products/gmail/gmail-security-authentication-spam-protection /</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T20:17:55.545846Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.google/products/gmail/gmail-security-authentication-spam-protection/" />; <author>; <name>;ilamont</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ilamont</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/gmail_security_policies_hero_2.width-1200.format-webp.webp" style="宽度：220px； height: 92px;" />;<br />;Gmail 对批量发件人提出了新的要求，以增强电子邮件安全性。这些要求包括强大的电子邮件身份验证、轻松取消订阅以及明确的垃圾邮件率阈值。这些更改旨在保护用户免受垃圾邮件和垃圾邮件的侵害。恶意邮件。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gmail-yahoo-announce-new-2024-authentication-requirements-for-bulk-senders" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38074992" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用 YouTube 提高英语发音</stitle>; <id>;https://youglish.com/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T20:17:55.549579Z</更新>; <link href="https://youglish.com/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;vikrum </名称>; <uri>;https:// /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=vikrum</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://youglish.com/images/fb6.jpg" style="宽度：220px； height: 194px;" />;<br />;使用 YouTube 来提高您的英语发音。YouGlish 拥有超过 100M 的曲目，可以为您快速、公正地回答真实的人在上下文中如何说英语。示例：力量、勇气、致命一击，进展如何？（高级搜索）<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#use-youtube-to-improve-your-english-pronunciation" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38074701" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Grug Brained 开发人员 (2022)</stitle>; <id>;https://grugbrain .dev/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T23:17:55.550281Z</更新>; <link href="https://grugbrain.dev/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;simonsarris</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=simonsarris</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://grugbrain.dev/grug. png" 样式="宽度:220px; height: 196px;" />;<br />;The Grug Brained Developer (2022) 是一篇幽默的文章，作者是一位承认自己不太聪明，但多年来学到了一些东西的开发者。开发者分享了他们的经验和建议，包括在职业生涯中说“是”的重要性、80/20 解决方案的价值、正确分解代码的艺术、<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-grug-brained- Developer-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38076886" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;微服务的成本（2020）</stitle>; <id>;https://robertovitillo.com/costs-of-microservices/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T15:17:55.550951Z</更新>; <link href="https://robertovitillo.com /costs-of-microservices/"/>; <author>; <name>;kiyanwang</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kiyanwang</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://robertovitillo.com/static/20b3d909b15d98f33bee31e8357203ce/fcda8/monolith.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 249px;" />;<br />;应用程序通常以单体应用的形式开始其生命周期。减轻单体后端不断增长的痛苦的一种方法是将其拆分为一组通过 API 进行通信的独立可部署服务。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-costs-of-microservices-2020" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=38069915" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;历代苹果CPU架构</stitle>; <id>;https://jacobbartlett.substack.com/p/through-the-ages-apple-cpu-architecture</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T20:17:55.551623Z</更新>; <link href="https://jacobbartlett.substack.com/p/through-the-ages-apple-cpu-architecture"/>; <作者>; <name>;jakey_bakey</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jakey_bakey</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// /substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fef56b4d8-b9c0-4766 -98f4-ffebb24d9458_700x620.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 195px;" />;<br />;这是 Apple CPU 架构 4 个时代的故事。不过，每一章也充当基本 CPU 概念的框架。<a href="https://hackernews .betacat.io/#apple-cpu-architecture-through-the-ages" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 38074739" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;Kart：用于地理空间和表格数据的 DVC。Git for GIS</stitle>; <id>;https://kartproject.org/</id>; <updated>;2023-10-30T19:17:55.552276Z</updated >; <link href="https://kartproject.org/"/>; <作者>; <name>;starkparker</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=starkparker</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://kartproject.org/images/kart.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 132px;" />;<br />;Kart 还支持非地理空间平面数据表 - 单独存储或与矢量地理空间数据存储在存储库中。在几秒钟内准确同步系统之间的数据集。Kart 移动并应用最小的压缩更改集。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#kart-dvc-for-geospatial-and-tabular-data-git-for-gis" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38073512" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;SEC 指控 SolarWinds 和 CISO 欺诈、内部控制失败</stitle>; <id>;https://www.sec.gov/news /press-release/2023-227</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T22:17:55.553645Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.sec.gov/news/press-release/ 2023-227"/>; <作者>; <名称>;arkadiyt</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=arkadiyt</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://www.sec.gov/files/sec-logo.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;美国证券交易委员会已指控 SolarWinds Corporation 及其首席信息安全官 Timothy G. Brown 犯有与网络安全风险和漏洞相关的欺诈和内部控制失败罪。SolarWinds 和 Brown 涉嫌误导夸大网络安全实践和未能披露已知风险，从而损害了投资者的利益。美国证券交易委员会的投诉寻求禁令救济、没收非法所得、民事处罚，以及禁止布朗高管和董事。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sec -charges-solarwinds-and-ciso-with-fraud-internal-control-failures" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =38076636" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type= “text">;研究发现，自闭症患者不太可能屈服于旁观者效应</stitle>; <id>;https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2023/10/231026131628.htm</id>; <更新>; 2023-10-30T15:17:55.554322Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2023/10/231026131628.htm"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Podgajski</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Podgajski</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.sciencedaily.com /images/scidaily-icon.png" style="width: 220px;身高：221px;" />;<br />;根据最新研究，自闭症患者在工作场所中不太可能受到旁观者效应的影响。他们更有可能在面对不当行为或错误时进行干预，这凸显了积极的一面自闭症的各个方面以及雇用神经分歧个体的潜在好处。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#people-with-autism-less-likely-to-succumb-to-bystander-effect-research-找到" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38067494" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;替换 WebRTC：使用 WebTransport 和 WebCodecs 实现实时延迟</ stitle>; <id>;https://quic.video/blog/replacing-webrtc/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T15:17:55.554977Z</更新>; <link href="https://quic .video/blog/replacing-webrtc/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;kixelated</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kixelated</uri>; </author>; <内容类型=“html”>; <img src =“https://quic.video/blog/replacing-webrtc/artifact.png”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 123px;" />;<br />;WebRTC 是一个强大的实时媒体工具，但它有其局限性和挑战。它是一个难以定制且缺乏灵活性的整体解决方案。但是，有一些有前途的替代方案即将出现的技术，例如 WebCodecs 和 WebTransport，它们提供了更多控制和优化的可能性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#replacing-webrtc-real-time-latency-with-webtransport-and- webcodecs" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38069974" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;递归绘图</stitle>; <id>;http:// recursivedrawing.com/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T20:17:55.555622Z</更新>; <link href="http://recursivedrawing.com/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;andrewla</ name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=andrewla</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;递归绘图是对用户界面思想的探索，旨在开发面向空间的编程环境。完整的说明列表（由 Rory O'Kane 撰写）<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#recursive-drawing" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38072278" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;基于 eBPF 的自动检测优于手动检测</stitle>; <id>;https://odigos.io/blog/ebpf-instrumentation-比手动更快</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T14:17:55.556292Z</更新>; <link href="https://odigos.io/blog/ebpf-instrumentation-faster-than-manual "/>; <author>; <name>;edenfed</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=edenfed</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://odigos.io/_next/image?url=%2Febpf_vs_manual.png&w=3840&q=75" style="宽度：220px；高度：104px；" />;<br />;基于 eBPF 的自动检测在性能测试中优于手动检测，速度提高了 20 倍以上。它将数据记录和处理分开，减少工作量、对象分配和网络调用。以最小的性能开销实现自动分布式跟踪是可能的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ebpf-based-auto-instrumentation-outperforms-manual-instrumentation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38069659" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;近似最近邻 Oh Yeah（烦人）</stitle>; <id>;https://zilliz.com/learn/approximate-nearest-neighbor-oh-yeah- ANNOY</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T17:17:55.556947Z</更新>; <link href="https://zilliz.com/learn/approximate-nearest-neighbor-oh-yeah-ANNOY"/ >; <作者>; <名称>;fzliu</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fzliu</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://assets.zilliz.com/frank_984c125080.jpeg”样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：220像素；” />;<br />;Annoy 是一种基于树的向量索引算法，它使用树木森林来进行最近邻居搜索。它对向量空间进行分区并仅搜索分区的子集以查找最近邻居。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#approximate-nearest-neighbor-oh-yeah-annoy" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38072277" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;关于安全、可靠和值得信赖的人工智能的行政命令</stitle>; <id>;https://www.whitehouse.gov/briefing-room/statements-releases/2023 /10/30/情况说明书-总统-拜登-问题-执行命令-安全-安全-可信赖-人工智能/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T12：17：55.557878Z </更新>; <link href="https://www.whitehouse.gov/briefing-room/statements-releases/2023/10/30/fact-sheet-president-biden-issues-executive-order-on-safe -secure-and-trustworthy-artificial-intelligence/"/>; <author>; <name>;Mandelmus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Mandelmus</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/themes/whitehouse/assets/img/wh-outline.svg" style="width: 220px;高度：114px;" />;<br />;拜登总统发布了一项行政命令，通过建立安全和安保新标准、保护隐私、促进公平、促进创新等来确保美国在人工智能领域处于领先地位。该命令指导了以下行动：要求开发人员共享安全测试结果，制定人工智能系统标准，防止人工智能欺诈，并推进网络安全。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#executive-order-on-safe-secure -and-trustworthy-artificial-intelligence" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38067314" target="_blank">;[ comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;CURP协议简介</ stitle>; <id>;https://datenlord.github.io/xline-home/#/blog/2023-08-18-Introduction-to-CURP-Protocol</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T20:17 ：55.559218Z</更新>; <link href="https://datenlord.github.io/xline-home/#/blog/2023-08-18-Introduction-to-CURP-Protocol"/>; <作者>; <名称>;SandmanDZ</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=SandmanDZ</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/#introduction-to-curp-protocol" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38074406" 目标="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;法官减少了艺术家针对 Midjourney、Stability AI 的人工智能版权诉讼</stitle>; <id>;https://www.reuters.com/legal/litigation/judge-pares-down-artists-ai-copyright-lawsuit-against- midjourney-stability-ai-2023-10-30/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T23:17:55.559782Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.reuters.com/legal/诉讼/judge-pares-down-artists-ai-copyright-lawsuit-against-midjourney-stability-ai-2023-10-30/"/>; <author>; <name>;starshadowx2</name>; <uri>;https:// /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=starshadowx2</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cloudfront-us-east-2.images.arcpublishing.com /reuters/2OFZNUCC7NKTTL77WA7JI23VXY.jpg" style="宽度：220px;高度：147px;" />;<br />;周一，加州联邦法院的一名法官驳回了视觉艺术家提起的诉讼，这些艺术家指控 Stability AI、Midjourney 和 DeviantArt 在公司的生成人工智能系统中滥用其受版权保护的作品。< a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#judge-pares-down-artists-ai-copyright-lawsuit-against-midjourney-stability-ai" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38076903" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;由纳米孔跨膜电位驱动的 DNA 涡轮</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nature.com/articles /s41565-023-01527-8</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T17:17:55.560337Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nature.com/articles/s41565-023- 01527-8"/>; <作者>; <名称>;bookofjoe</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bookofjoe</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://media.springernature.com/lw685/springer-static/image/art%3A10.1038%2Fs41565-023-01527-8/MediaObjects/41565_2023_1527_Fig1_HTML.png" style="宽度：220px ; height: 223px;" />;<br />;研究人员成功设计并演示了纳米级 DNA 折纸涡轮机，可以将电化学势转化为机械功。这些纳米涡轮机可以以高达每秒 10 转的单向运动旋转，并有潜力用于纳米级主动机器人工程。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#dna-turbine-powered-by-a-transmembrane-pottial-across-a-nanopore" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38072012" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;私募股权正在吞噬美国经济</stitle>; <id>;https://www .theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2023/10/private-equity-publicly-traded-companies/675788/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T14:17:55.560956Z</更新>; <link href= “https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2023/10/private-equity-publicly-traded-companies/675788/”/>; <作者>; <名称>;fortran77</名称>; <uri>;https： //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fortran77</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/j46ndE6sj1BBs3_vsXowNBwva5A=/1x0 ：965x542/960x540/media/img/mt/2023/10/StockMarketPoof/original.gif" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;私募股权行业正在吞噬美国上市公司，导致上市公司数量大幅减少。私募股权公司的运作缺乏透明度和问责制，导致潜在的企业不当行为和经济不稳定. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#private-equity-is-devouring-the-us-economy" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38069197" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Unlogged – Java 的开源记录和重播</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 38071552</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T18:17:55.561566Z</更新>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38071552"/>; <作者>; <名称>;shardullavekar</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=shardullavekar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Hello HN！Parth 和 Shardul 已构建无日志记录。 io，一个用于通过断言、模拟和代码覆盖来记录和重放 Java 代码的工具。他们开发了这个工具来帮助在提交之前识别生产代码中的重大更改。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-unlogged-open-source-record-and-replay-for-java" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38071552" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Google Brain 创始人称大型科技公司在人工智能危险问题上撒谎</stitle>; <id>;https://www.afr.com/technology /google-brain-Founder-says-big-tech-is-lying-about-ai- human-extinction-danger-20231027-p5efnz</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T17:17:55.562135Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.afr.com/technology/google-brain-Founder-says-big-tech-is-lying-about-ai- human-extinction-danger-20231027-p5efnz"/>; <author>; <name>;emptysongglass</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=emptysongglass</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://static.ffx.io/images/$width_140%2C$height_140/t_crop_fill%2Cq_auto:best%2Cfl_any_format/c7f83f0e5a26b8c27942a2c7377dbd63fe5f2816" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;人工智能可能导致人类灭绝的想法是大型科技公司为了扼杀人工智能市场竞争而散布的谎言。顶级人工智能专家吴恩达警告说，将这种错误想法与繁琐的许可要求相结合是一项愚蠢的政策提议。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#google-brain-Founder-says-big-tech-is-lying-about-ai-danger" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38072218" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我不小心为我的公司节省了 50 万美元</stitle>; <id>;https://ludic.mataroa.blog/blog /i-accidentally-saved-half-a-million-dollars/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T14:17:55.562677Z</更新>; <link href="https://ludic.mataroa.blog /blog/i-accidentally-saved-half-a-million-dollars/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;softskunk</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=softskunk< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;我在大约五分钟内为我的公司节省了 50 万美元。这比我在整个职业生涯中为雇主赚的钱还要多，因为这个行业是一个骗局。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-accidentally-saved-my-company-half-a-million-dollars" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38069710" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;托马斯·爱迪生的混凝土房屋</stitle>; <id>;https://www.atlasobscura.com/places/thomas-edisons-concrete-houses< /id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T12:17:55.563212Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.atlasobscura.com/places/thomas-edisons-concrete-houses"/>; <作者>; <name>;adrian_mrd</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=adrian_mrd</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// /img.atlasobscura.com/uS7uZBuhIR8BD9B7OGO8WP38pX31G55ujcAeee3sf8E/rt:fit/h:390/q:81/sm:1/scp:1/ar:1/aHR0cHM6Ly9hdGxh/cy1kZXYuczMuYW1h/em9uYXdzLmNvbS91 /cGxvYWRzL3BsYWNl/X2ltYWdlcy9mMWY3/MDliOC1mZWQwLTQ2/MDItYmFkMy01NGMz/ZjlkNTA3ZGRmNmI5/YjFiNjVjYjUyZDJl /NTNfdGhvbWFzLWVk/aXNvbi1jb25jcmV0/ZS1ob3VzZS00Lmpw/Zw.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;美国著名发明家托马斯·爱迪生于1908年申请了使用混凝土建造房屋的专利。虽然这个想法超前于时代，但最终还是失败了。他的一些混凝土房屋今天仍然屹立不倒。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#thomas-edison-s-concrete-houses" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38057265" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;自动死代码清理</stitle>; <id>;https://engineering.fb.com/2023/10/24/data-infrastruct/automating-dead-代码清理/</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T20:17:55.564277Z</更新>; <link href="https://engineering.fb.com/2023/10/24/data-infrastruct/ automating-dead-code-cleanup/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;dangoldin </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dangoldin</uri>; </作者>; <内容type="html">;<img src="https://engineering.fb.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Eng-Blog-Self-Serve-Hero-Images-DEBUGGING-201-Teale.jpg “样式=”宽度：220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Meta 的系统代码和资产删除框架 (SCARF) 自动识别并删除程序中的死代码，最大限度地降低开发人员成本。SCARF 结合静态和动态分析来检测死代码并创建更改请求以删除<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#automating-dead-code-cleanup" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=38070001" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;个人网站模式 (2003)</stitle>; <id>;http://www.rdrop.com/~half/Creations/Writings/Web.patterns/index.html </id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T14:17:55.564826Z</更新>; <link href="http://www.rdrop.com/~half/Creations/Writings/Web.patterns/index.html "/>; <author>; <name>;surprisetalk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=surprisetalk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;这些模式用于创建个人网站的方法是在过去几年中从我发现的最有趣的个人网站中提炼出来的。有关这些模式的更多信息，请阅读简介。这些模式的最后一次修订是在 2003 年 7 月。有关更改的摘要，请参阅修订历史记录。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#patterns-for-personal-web-sites-2003" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38064453" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Ertdfgcvb</stitle>; <id>;https://www.thefire.org/news/does-first -amendment-allow-public-officials-block-their-critics-online-supreme-court-will-soon</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T20:17:55.567010Z</更新>; <link href=" https://www.thefire.org/news/does-first-amendment-allow-public-officials-block-their-critics-online-supreme-court-will-soon"/>; <作者>; <名称>;fortran77< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fortran77</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.thefire. org/sites/default/files/styles/450x300/public/2022/08/students-college-campus-Shutterstock-19.jpg?h=50ff4a78&itok=WWVHP_Cl" style="width: 220px;高度：147px;" />;<br />;政客利用社交媒体压制批评者是违宪的。最高法院将听取有关公职人员是否可以在社交媒体上屏蔽批评者的争论。<a href="https://hackernews .betacat.io/#scotus-to-decide-if-public-officials-can-block-critics-online" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=38074226" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;巴赫沙利手稿</stitle>; <id>;https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bakhshali_manuscript</id>; <更新>;2023-10-30T13:17:55.567660Z </更新>; <link href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bakhshali_manuscript"/>; <作者>; <名称>;talonx</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=talonx</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/63/Bakhshali_manuscript.jpg/250px -Bakhshali_manuscript.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：126px;" />;<br />;Bakhshali 手稿是写在桦树皮上的古印度数学文本，于 1881 年发现。它被认为是印度现存最古老的数学手稿，包含印度最早使用的零符号。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bakhshali-manuscript" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=38068363" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
